content: the work with the ws hanging loop facing you you should have 15 sts on the needle in your left hand and 15 sts on the needle in your gauge 22 sts x 28 row for a 10cm x 10cm square right hand work on the 15 sts on the left hand in stockinette stitch on 4mm needles don t worry needle to start the top of the mitten with green about gauge for this pattern it is not critical yarn row 1 p15 30 sts knitting pattern work across all 30 sts for the following row mini mitten row 2 to 9 starting on a rs knit row work 8 row make 1 cast on 30 sts in green on 4mm needles in stockinette stitch start at the cuff row 10 k2tog k1 10 times 20 sts row 1 to 4 k1 p1 to end row 11 purl row 5 ws purl row 12 k2tog 10 times 10 sts row 6 rs k14 m1 k2 m1 k14 32 sts pull through to cast off row 7 purl row 8 k14 m1 k4 m1 k14 34 sts making up row 9 purl use mattress stitch for seaming sew the side edges of the thumb together sew the side edges row 10 k14 m1 k6 m1 k14 36 sts of the mitten together embroider a white star onto row 11 purl the front of the mitten for the hanging loop row 12 k14 m1 k8 m1 k14 38 sts crochet a single chain 12cm long and bind off sew the ends of the chain to the top of the mitten cuff mini mittens copyright © 2015 amanda berry page 2 of 2
